# transposeWords(_:)

**Instance Method**

Transposes the words around the current selection.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func transposeWords(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Transposing Elements

- **transpose(_:)**: Transposes the content around the current selection.
